reviews.review_msg: I thought this class sounded vey interesting prior to taking it, and I was a bit disappointed. The class content in lectures did not transition/flow well. Remember to take notes while watching documentaries in class, it will help you on the midterm and final exam. When you do the group project remember to use many different scholars resources.

Have nothing bad to say about this prof. She makes the class feel very comfortable and is extremely approachabe. She wants all her students to succeed, and teaches using a variey different of activities. Highly recommend taking her class.
